metadata.title: CVE-2020-15963 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in extensions in Google Chrome prior to85.0.4183.121 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a craftedChrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
